Hydras:

Hydras reached a Room where he only could reach and presed some 
buttons, a door opened and... Hydras appeared? How could it be? It 
was a electronic puppet what was identically Hydras.

Following the same idea as Megatron of Beast Wars, Perceptor did one 
to Hydras for one ocation as this. The control was simple: the chair 
picked up the signals of his torso and legs and send them to the 
puppet to move it. some special "Gloves" picked the signal of his 
arms and hands, and as the "Chair" sent it to the puppet. A Special 
helmet trasmited to receptor what the puppet see and heard and a 
microphone let receptor sent his voice to the puppet.

"AS you see "hissed Hydras"I was keeping this little puppet for 
ocattions of this... Now here are my commands: YOu Inferno and 
QuickStrike will follow this puppet and will act as normally, as if 
this thing is me... If this puppet it's destruyed you imediatly come 
back base... Waspinator will remain here with me... I might need you 
at hand... Understand????"

while he was giving his instructions he was sitting done in the 
chair and dressing the "gloves". 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Vykos: Ah! I knew you would understand, Megatron! I will land 
there 
> now and wait for you. Bring slaves to protect you if you want; I 
will 
> keep them... say... entertained, yes. My own slave is there too, 
you 
> know! See you then. Lord Vykos out.
> 
> He closed the channel and turned to Warghoul.
> 
> Warghoul: Coordinates logged in. ETA in 10 decacycles.
> 
> Lord Vykos, however, did not seem very pleased.
> 
> Vykos: This is not Megatron alone... He almost discarded me... I 
will 
> remind him what a true Renegade Lord is like.
> 
> Warghoul shifted (just a little, considering his shapeless body) 
but 
> said nothing. Just then Lord Vykos left the bridge and went away. 
He 
> seemed to be boiling with anger, which was not quite a good 
thing...
>
